title: The Walking Dead season 10: Carol and Alpha to face off in episode 3
text:
The Walking Dead’s Alexandria is in serious turmoil as a sea of walkers make their way to invade their safe zone in the next episode of season 10…but that will be the least of their worries.

In a teaser clip for the upcoming addition to the cult favourite show, the Whisperers will still be causing problems for our beloved survivors as things look increasingly bleak.

As Daryl (Norman Reedus) and Michonne (Danai Gurira) are given instructions by the Whisperers newest recruit Gamma (Thora Birch) to meet with Alpha (Samantha Morton), the request is met with a divisive camp.

The Highwaymen want revenge for the loss of their loved ones at the hands of the Whisperers, while Michonne wants information that could secure their safety.

Meeting at the borderline (home of the now infamous pike scene that claimed the lives of ten Alexandria residents), things don’t seem well.

But then there’s the moment we’ve all been waiting for…Alpha and Carol coming face-to-face.

The Whisperers War is coming (Picture: FOX)

Carol has some scores to settle with murderer Alpha, whose instructions resulted in the beheading of 10 of her nearest and dearest, including her adopted son, Henry.

Alpha then utters the horrific declaration that someone had crossed the line into Whisperer territory.

‘What did I tell you about crossing my borders? You have to be punished,’ Alpha chillingly warns.

‘You better run.’

Michonne, Daryl and Carol look ready for battle as a horde of Whisperers make their way towards them.

The Whisperer War is in full effect everyone, get ready for some bloodshed.

The Walking Dead airs Sundays at 9pm on AMC in the US and Mondays at 9pm on Fox in the UK.
